thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Victor
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Victor

author: Victor
title: Victor
text:
David Sklar and Associates is a refreshing change in a business world that often is mired in hype and negativity. From day one dealing with Rhoda Lewis and all of the staff has been an unexpected but very welcome pleasure. My situation was particularly stressful and I'm very grateful for the professionalism that Rhoda Lewis , in particular, has displayed over the last 2 years .
Her knowledge ,patience and energy throughout the bankruptcy process is very appreciated. I have recommended the firm to a number of people as a direct result of dealing with her.
Although bankruptcy is not necessarily a pleasurable experience it has nonetheless been a less stressful
to deal with the matter of my bankruptcy because of her.
